name: JSC "SEB Open Pension Fund"
goal: JSC "SEB Open Pension Fund" goals are: provide financial protection to the pension plan members by offering occupational pension schemes and individual pension savings accounts. Financial stability and welfare of society is crucial for long term sustainability and economical growth for country as well as for every individual separately.
interests: Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union
euInitiatives: REGULATION OF THE EUROPEAN PARLIAMENT AND OF THE COUNCIL on a pan-European Personal Pension Product (PEPP)
